content.text: Hey there! I am a big fan of sustainable clothing. Do you have any favorite brands?
Hi there! I do, I love Everlane and Reformation.
I have heard great things about Everlane! I have not heard of Reformation before.
They are a pretty new brand but they are doing great things with sustainability. I also love their aesthetic.
I will have to check them out! I have been trying to find more sustainable brands to support.
It's so important to support brands that are doing good for the environment.
I agree! I love to bake too. What is your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make cupcakes! They are so easy and fun to decorate.
I love cupcakes too! I love making them with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I usually make them by myself but it would be fun to have some help.
I would love to help you make cupcakes! We could have a cupcake party!
That would be so much fun! We could make all different kinds of cupcakes and have a contest to see who can make the best one.
That sounds like a great idea! I love cupcakes!
Me too! They are my favorite dessert.
Mine too! I love chocolate cupcakes with vanilla frosting.
Those are my favorite too! We should definitely have a cupcake party soon.
I would love that! We could make a whole day of it
